Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters of each motion blur quality level.

enabled.Wiki: If ON, motion blur is enabled

ombEnabled.Wiki: If ON, motion blur is applied to objects.

forceScaleVelocityBuffer.Wiki: Reduce the resolution of the velocity buffer used internally. No effect if precision velocity buffers are not being used.

cheapFilterMode.Wiki: If ON, ignore reconstruction filter for motion blur calculations, and instead use a lighter process.

sampleCountBias.Wiki: Set the bias to apply to the sample count. Set to a multiple of 2.

recurrenceCountBias.Wiki: Set the bias to apply to the number of recursive blurs.

blurMaxLengthScale.AltName: Scale Value for Blur Maximum Length
blurMaxLengthScale.Wiki: The scale value to use for the blur maximum length parameter.
